text: Istynno, Ty vpevnyshsya, shcho sylʹnishe za vsikh lyudey nenavydyatʹ tykh, yaki uviruvaly, yudeyi ta bahatobozhnyky. Istynno, ty pobachysh, shcho nayblyzhchi v lyubovi do tykh, yaki uviruvaly, ti, yaki hovoryatʹ: «Voistynu, my — khrystyyany!» Tse tak, adzhe sered nykh ye svyashchenyky y chentsi, i vony ne vyvyshchuyutʹ sebe
